changelog: Unified all Forge build templates into a single dynamic Jinja2-based template system.
Added support for automatic variable rendering from versions.json to generate build.gradle and gradle.properties.
Introduced new MainMod.java.j2 template with placeholders for mod_id, group, and author.
Included default files required for complete mod structure: mods.toml, pack.mcmeta, LICENSE.txt, and Gradle wrapper files.
Refactored versions.json with expanded metadata for each Minecraft–Forge version (Java version, eventBus7, reobf, etc.).
Simplified EverMod CLI integration — templates are now self-contained and version-aware.
Removed redundant per-version build.gradle files, replaced by Jinja2 parameterization for maintainability and scalability.
notes: This update transitions EverMod templates from static version-based files to a unified, auto-generated structure using Jinja2. It enables faster updates, reduces duplication, and ensures future compatibility with all supported Minecraft–Forge versions.
